long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record, clip and share voice notes with just a click.

Record your voice through Echovault and clip the message on any website you visit. Use it for revision, summarizing pages, taking notes, explaining ideas to your friends, and more.

Share these clips with friends, students, colleagues, or anyone you choose via our user-friendly website. With just a click, they can access the exact information you want to share, seamlessly embedded in there webpage.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WHAT YOU WILL GET

    - Record You voice message instantly.

    - Share you message to anyone on internet.

    - Clip the records you like to the websites it belong with easy to hide embedded UI.

    - Gain access to our website to create multiple clips of your recordings, share them, and enjoy a user-friendly interface for managing your records.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
HOW IT WORKS

   -  Record you voice.

   -  Save it in your storage with unique name.

   - Clip the record on the page you are currently browsing or use our site to clip on custom url.

    - Share the clip with anyone on Echovault with our website.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
USE CASES

   - If you're a researcher or someone who enjoys noting information, simply record and clip while browsing the page for later revisiting.


   - If you're a student, read the page and summarize it for future revision.
   - As a teacher, record relevant messages from websites, clip them, and share with students for quick and easy understanding of concepts.

   - If you're someone who wants to jot down ideas as they come throughout the day, simply record them and revisit later.

   - Make your voice heard, regardless of your profession.
